title: SOSS GAMING 2023 Genuine Analog Joysticks Repair Kit for Xbox One - Fixes Stick Drift, Broken, and Loose Joysticks on Regular, S, and Elite Series 1 Controllers
features: ORIGINAL PARTS: These joysticks are 100% original products and of the highest quality.

MONEY SAVER: Have a non-properly working joystick? Don't worry! This kit is the perfect solution to make your controller working like new again. No need to shell out $60-$180 or more for a brand new controller. Please Note: You will need basic soldering skills along with soldering tools and other basic tools. Complete list is in the description.
WHAT THIS FIXES: Stick drift, creeping, stuttering, blind spots, dead zones, no click, non-centered, broken, and loose joysticks.

PACKAGE INCLUDES: 6X Joysticks, 1X T8 Security Torx Screwdriver, 1X T6 Torx Screwdriver, 1X Prying Tool. Compatible with Xbox Original Controller including Regular, S, and Elite Series 1 Wireless Models.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - We back our products! If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase within 90 days, we will refund or send you a replacement free of charge! Your satisfaction is our priority, and we will be there for you should you have any questions or concerns.
description: Replacing your Joystick will fix and repair many joystick issues and problems including but not limited to: stick drift, creeping, stuttering, blind spots, dead zones, no click, non-centered, broken, and loose joysticks.
